subject: RE: [junit] Using JUnit with Kawa
msgSnippet: Hi George, I certainly did. Thanks for the response. Dan MacKay
messageBody:
Hi George,

I certainly did. Thanks for the response.

Dan MacKay


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Dinwiddie, George [mailto:George.Dinwiddie@arbitron.com]
> Sent: Wednesday, February 14, 2001 1:58 PM
> To: 'junit@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [junit] Using JUnit with Kawa
>
>
> Did you set "Set projects classpath before running the command" when you
> set up JUnit within Kawa?
>
> - George
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Dan MacKay [mailto:dmackay@kingston.hummingbird.com]
> Sent: Wednesday, February 14, 2001 1:26 PM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [junit] Using JUnit with Kawa
>
>
> Hi Eric,
>
> Thanks for the reply. Junit is launching fine. When I go run any
> of my test
> cases or suites from JUnit when it is launched from inside Kawa it cannot
> find the test class files.
>
> Dan MacKay
